attributes.action: Not spend millions on fireworks next NYE & give the money to homeless shelters
attributes.background: This New Year Eve 1.8 million pounds were spent on fireworks that lasted 20 minutes. This money would be better being donated to homeless shelters and charities for this is the true meaning of Christmas

rejection.details:
We're not sure which fireworks you're referring to. If you are concerned about the cost of the New Year's Eve fireworks display in London, that's the responsibility of the London Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
